inlineContent.text: Teads SDK is currently distributed through CocoaPods and Swift Package Manager. It includes everything you need to serve ‚Äúoutstream‚Äù video ads.

SDK, also known as OM SDK. The OM SDK brings transparency to the advertising world, giving a way to standardize the viewability and verification measurement for the ads served through mobile apps. Teads is part of the

abstract.text: Teads allows you to integrate a single SDK into your app, and serve premium branded ‚Äúoutstream‚Äù video ads from Teads SSP ad server.
